00026 #include "ConsoleTable.h"
00027 #include <stdlib.h>
00028 #include <string.h>
00029 #include <stdio.h>
00030 #include "StringUtilities.h"
00031 
00032 ConsoleTableT* ConsoleTableCreate()
00033 {
00034     ConsoleTableT* tableObj;
00035     tableObj = (ConsoleTableT*) malloc(sizeof(ConsoleTableT));
00036     if (tableObj != NULL)
00037     {
00038         tableObj->numFields = 0;
00039         tableObj->fields = NULL;
00040         tableObj->linePrepend[0] = '\0';
00041         tableObj->lineAppend[0] = '\0';
00042         strcpy(tableObj->colDelimiter, CONSOLE_TABLE_DEFAULT_COL_DELIMITER);
00043         tableObj->padding = 0;
00044     }
00045     return tableObj;
00046 }
00047 
00048 int ConsoleTableAddField(ConsoleTableT* tableObj, unsigned width,
00049         const char* name, enum ConsoleTableAlignment alignment)
00050 {
00051     unsigned i = tableObj->numFields, newNumFields = tableObj->numFields + 1;
00052     tableObj->fields = (struct Field*) realloc((void *) tableObj->fields,
00053             sizeof(struct Field) * newNumFields);
00054     if (tableObj->fields != NULL)
00055     {
00056         tableObj->numFields = newNumFields;
00057         tableObj->fields[i].width = width;
00058         tableObj->fields[i].alignment = alignment;
00059         tableObj->fields[i].name[0] = '\0';
00060         strncat(
00061                 tableObj->fields[i].name,
00062                 name,
00063                 (width > CONSOLE_TABLE_FIELD_NAME_MAXLEN) ? CONSOLE_TABLE_FIELD_NAME_MAXLEN
00064                         : width);
00065         return 1;
00066     }
00067     return 0;
00068 }
00069 
00070 void ConsoleTableSetLinePrepend(ConsoleTableT* tableObj, const char* prependstr)
00071 {
00072     tableObj->linePrepend[0] = '\0';
00073     strncat(tableObj->linePrepend, prependstr, CONSOLE_TABLE_MAX_SEPARATOR_LEN);
00074 }
00075 
00076 void ConsoleTableSetLineAppend(ConsoleTableT* tableObj, const char* appendStr)
00077 {
00078     tableObj->lineAppend[0] = '\0';
00079     strncat(tableObj->lineAppend, appendStr, CONSOLE_TABLE_MAX_SEPARATOR_LEN);
00080 }
00081 
00082 void ConsoleTableSetColDelimiter(ConsoleTableT* tableObj, const char* colDelimiterStr)
00083 {
00084     tableObj->colDelimiter[0] = '\0';
00085     strncat(tableObj->colDelimiter, colDelimiterStr, CONSOLE_TABLE_MAX_SEPARATOR_LEN);
00086 }
00087 
00088 void ConsoleTableSetPadding(ConsoleTableT* tableObj, unsigned padding)
00089 {
00090     tableObj->padding = padding;
00091 }

00115 static void ConsoleTableFillCellHelper(ConsoleTableT* tableObj,
00116         const char* content, unsigned i)
00117 {
00118     char formatedContent[tableObj->fields[i].width];
00119 
00120     if (tableObj->fields[i].alignment == CONSOLE_TABLE_ALIGNMENT_LEFT)
00121     {
00122         sprintf(formatedContent, "%-*s", tableObj->fields[i].width, StringAbbreviate(
00123                 content, tableObj->fields[i].width));
00124     }
00125     else // assume CONSOLE_TABLE_ALIGNMENT_RIGHT
00126     {
00127         sprintf(formatedContent, "%*s", tableObj->fields[i].width, StringAbbreviate(
00128                 content, tableObj->fields[i].width));
00129     }
00130 
00131     if (i != 0)
00132     {
00133         printf("%*s", tableObj->padding, "");
00134         printf("%s",tableObj->colDelimiter);
00135         printf("%*s", tableObj->padding, "");
00136     }
00137     printf("%s", formatedContent);
00138 }
00139 
00140 void ConsoleTableFillCell(ConsoleTableT* tableObj, const char* content)
00141 {
00142     static unsigned i = 0;
00143 //  if (i >= tableObj->numFields)
00144 //  {
00145 //      i = 0;
00146 //      printf("%s\n", tableObj->lineAppend);
00147 //  }
00148     if(i == 0)
00149     {
00150         printf("%s", tableObj->linePrepend);
00151     }
00152     ConsoleTableFillCellHelper(tableObj, content, i);
00153     i++;
00154     if (i >= tableObj->numFields)
00155     {
00156         i = 0;
00157         printf("%s\n", tableObj->lineAppend);
00158     }
00159 }
00160 
00161 void ConsoleTablePrintHeader(ConsoleTableT* tableObj)
00162 {
00163     unsigned i;
00164     printf("%s", tableObj->linePrepend);
00165     for (i = 0; i < tableObj->numFields; i++)
00166     {
00167         ConsoleTableFillCellHelper(tableObj, tableObj->fields[i].name, i);
00168     }
00169     printf("%s\n", tableObj->lineAppend);
00170 }
00171 
00172 void ConsoleTableDelete(ConsoleTableT* tableObj)
00173 {
00174     free(tableObj->fields);
00175     free(tableObj);
00176 }
